import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import './navbar.css' import logo from '../Assets/logoo.jpg' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/Shopcontext' const Navbar = () => { const { getTotalItems } = useContext(ShopContext) const totalItems = getTotalItems() return (
  • Shop
  • About
  • Contact
{localStorage.getItem('auth-token') ? : }
{totalItems}
) } export default Navbar
